job_description:
• Excellent programming skills for writing and debugging ATE test programs and test-related hardware development.
• Proficiency with Advantest V93K ATE platforms and/or other logic device ATE testers is preferred.
• Prefer candidates with outstanding digital, analog, and MXS test programming and debug experience.
• Bachelor’s or master’s degree in Electrical Engineering or Computer Engineering with 7+ years of proven experience in Test Engineering role.
• Demonstrated experience specifying probe card designs for Advantest 93K platforms and collaborating with probe card vendors.
• Experience with data analysis software in support of characterization reports and yield reporting tools such as JMP.
• Proficiency in programming with C/C++ and/or JAVA is required.
• Proven understanding of testing for CMOS SoCs.
